subtitle: Community
title: Events
content: Join us for a series of engaging events designed to enhance your cybersecurity skills.

upcomingEvents.title: Cybersecurity Basics
upcomingEvents.description: Introductory event designed to teach the fundamental principles of cybersecurity to people with no prior experience.

upcomingEvents.title: Advanced Threat Detection
upcomingEvents.description: Training in advanced techniques to identify and mitigate sophisticated cyber threats.

upcomingEvents.title: Cybersecurity Innovation Summit
upcomingEvents.description: Explore the latest trends and innovative solutions in cybersecurity.
